verses.roman:
pūrṇa bhagavān avatare yei kāle
āra saba avatāra tāṅte āsi' mile

synonyms: pūrṇa—full; bhagavān—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; avatare—incarnates; yei—that; kāle—at the time; āra—other; saba—all; avatāra—incarnations; tāṅte—in Him; āsi'-coming; mile—meet.
translation: When the complete Supreme Personality of Godhead descends, all other incarnations of the Lord meet together within Him.
